metatags.twitter:title: Photo shows Obama and Fauci visiting a lab in the US, not China
metatags.og:title: Photo shows Obama and Fauci visiting a lab in the US, not China
metatags.og:description: Social media posts shared thousands of times claim a photo shows a 2015 visit by then-US president Barack Obama, infectious diseases expert Dr. Anthony Fauci and philanthropist Melinda Gates to a laboratory in China’s Wuhan, which later became ground zero for the coronavirus pandemic. But the photo was actually taken the previous year at a lab in Maryland, and Gates does not appear in it.
metatags.twitter:creator: @afpfactuel

ClaimReview.claimReviewed: Photo shows a 2015 visit by then-US president
